name: Highway Bike Rider – Motor Bike Race Simulator with Deadliest Stunts of 2016
name_original: Highway Bike Rider – Motor Bike Race Simulator with Deadliest Stunts of 2016
description:
Be Marvel, the highway bike rider. He has accepted the challenge of clearing the deadliest highway on the fastest speed. Can you guide him and complete each challenge without crashing into the deadly spike gates, spiked hammer and twister. Well timed jumps are needed.
Best of luck Marvel!
